text: @piersmorgan Not strictly factual, @piersmorgan - there ARE approved coronavirus vaccines for animals but not for humans.  Thought you were supposed to be a journalist? GET YOUR "FACTS" OUT ACCURATELY, if you can be bothered!!!!!!! Think you need to retire
